entities.name: remus
entities.description: Remus is a character in the story who is being addressed by Black. He is mentioned as someone who needs to help Lupin tell a story.

entities.name: black
entities.description: Black is a character in the story who is watching Scabbers's every move and is impatient for Remus to start telling the story.

entities.name: scabbers
entities.description: Scabbers is an animal that Black is watching. Lupin mentions that he only knows how the story began in relation to Scabbers.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is a character who Remus needs help from to tell the story.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is a character in the story who knows how it began and is trying to tell the story with Remus's help. He also mentions that he made the screams and howls heard by the villagers.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a character who says 'This place is haunted!' when they hear a loud creak behind Lupin.

entities.name: the shrieking shack
entities.description: The Shrieking Shack is a location that Lupin mentions as not being haunted. It's where the screams and howls were made by him.

relationships.description: Remus needs help from Sirius to tell the story.
Lupin knows how the story began in relation to Scabbers.
